entry.title: First Light
entry.summary:
Author: lighthouse_inkwell

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,293Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Bruce Wayne is overwhelmed.In trying to get initiatives off the ground that will actually improve Gotham's infrastructure, he unwillingly goes on a press tour in Metropolis, where he is met with increasingly personal questions about his reappearance into society, and of course (as always) his parents tragic deaths. Panic attacks ensue, Bruce meets a particularly polite reporter who talks him out of it, but is met with a brand new problem when a miscommunication leads the public into thinking Bruce is dating said reporter.Clark convinces Bruce that answering questions about a fake relationship would be leagues easier than answering questions about dead parents. Bruce agrees. And totally not because Clark has the most charming smiling he's ever seen.

entry.title: Attention (is the beginning of devotion)
entry.summary:
Author: Dopamine_Knight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,122Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 65

Summary: .Bruce Wayne is a man of many secrets. His identity as Batman, the falsity of Brucie Wayne, his one-sided love that caused the fall of Gotham’s White Knight... And a current, silly crush that is not as bad as Selina makes it to be. He knows Clark Kent’s only secret: he is Superman. He tries to guard this secret as close as he can to his chest, but one night he slips. And he thinks he’s just made Clark’s hatred of him all the more justifiable. ...But does he? Does Kal-El have only one secret, after all? .

entry.title: Am I Missing Something?
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,023Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 84

Summary: Clark pulls back, sitting on the edge of the computer's control panel. He runs his hands through his hair. "I think Dick doesn't approve of us," he blurts out, feeling ridiculous as he says it."Dick?" Bruce arches a brow, looking up at Clark, a flash of surprise flickering in his eyes. "Why would you think that?""Just a hunch." Clark shrugs. "And tonight I feel like he was kind of cold to me? I'm not used to that, I admit it. I've known Dick for so many years now, but it felt like he was… avoiding me?" (Or, Clark thinks Dick doesn't approve of his relationship with Bruce. But the truth is, Dick is just really bad a communicating and stupidly jealous.)

entry.title: The Devil Wears Prada
entry.summary:
Author: cloudfrog

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,035Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 197

Summary: Gotham's youngest prince, Damian Wayne, has built a thriving career and a carefully crafted image in the fashion industry. But beneath it all, he's been drowning in silence ever since Jon Kent drifted away. Until he meets Leon Devereaux-Burciaga, a bold designer who pulls him into an unexpected marriage proposal. Their connection sparks at Milan Fashion Week, setting the tabloids into a frenzy. Damian sees an opportunity to redefine himself. But when Jon reenters his life, there are choices to make. No powers AU

entry.title: New to Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: LapineDoodle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,117Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 10

Summary: So what if it's impulsive to move thousands of miles from home to New Jersey of all place? Gotham rent is cheap and have better public infrastructure despite the high crime rate. And beside, not like she can pass on the chance to attend Gotham University with free tuition thanks to grants and scholarship. So, it's time for Reyna to experience the wild Gotham City and potentially get herself into some shenanigans. At least there are bats and birds around to save the day.

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,847Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 52

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.

entry.title: Miss Noir’s Society Gossip Blog
entry.summary:
Author: taropot

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,493Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 30

Summary: Gotham’s elite have returned from their summer estates and rehab retreats for another season of charity galas, power marriages, and scandalous whispers. At the centre of it all? An anonymous online gossip columnist known only as Miss Noir — ruthless, relentless, and impeccably well-informed. No one is safe from their barbed prose. Not even Gotham's favourite frivolous playboy, Bruce Wayne. And certainly not the Batman. Tea will spill. Ships will sail. Secrets will out. And Miss Noir? They’ll be watching it all unfold, martini in hand.A Bridgerton-inspired AU set in modern-day Gotham society. Satirical, slowburn, and featuring Superbat plus enough side ships to sink a yacht.
